page.title: 07PORTISHEAD
page.content: When we got in Portishead Mr Lang let us do our{project.}He let us wander about for half an hour.In that half an hour we knocked on this old man's and lady's door.They were very nice.The old lady asked us if we wanted to come in.So we said yes. We went on in and they had two dogs. Then the old man took us in to his workshop.He said his hobby is to make train stations. He had one there which had two lights on which worked.Then the old lady said"Here are some sweets to share between you all".They called their house "The Buoy". BRYAN OSBORNE BRYN HERBERT
